channel.title: TSA is a bunch of pedophiles
channel.description:

Now they've searched an 8 year old boy. Woo!

item.title: TSA is a bunch of pedophiles
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Mr.Chris:

50+, big round spectacles, beard, balding and dribbling.

AHAHAHHA, mitb in a good few years…

@topic, if this is pedophilia what is felbot?

Read full topic
item.source: TSA is a bunch of pedophiles

item.title: TSA is a bunch of pedophiles
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:3, topic:390891”]For the safety of the country, I have to support this.

The TSA agents are doing their job as their told to do. We have psycho’s who will put bombs/weapons on their kids.[/quote][quote=“Mr.Chris, post:4, topic:390891”]Agree with casey tbh, but I guess I’d be annoyed if they did that to my kid. A light pat down is fine, I guess, unless the guy doing it is 50+, big round spectacles, beard, balding and dribbling.[/quote][quote=“Echo_, post:7, topic:390891”]Found this TSA pat down horror story, it’s fucking hilarious.

http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/40291856/ns/travel-news/[/quote]

Hahahahahaha. First two, naive as shit. Third is lulz because why does NO ONE DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT?

Read full topic

item.description:

If this is pedophilia then I’m pro-pedophilia, stops extremists (notice I didn’t use terrorists) exploiting the system.

[size=4pt]I’m not pro pedophilia at all, it was a radical statement to catch your attention, I find its disgusting. Pedophiles should be shot.[/size]

item.title: TSA is a bunch of pedophiles
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Last week, a 14 year old girl travelling alone was caught carrying a suitcase filled with a few 100’s of thousands of Euro’s. She was probably used by criminals to carry criminal money.

[quote=“casey., post:3, topic:390891”]For the safety of the country, I have to support this.

The TSA agents are doing their job as their told to do. We have psycho’s who will put bombs/weapons on their kids.[/quote]

This.
